entry.def: In many religions, a goddess is a female spirit or being that is believed to have power over a particular part of the world or nature.

stems_affixes.word_buile: godd=god神+ess女性,雌性→n.女神;绝世美女

mistress[[n.主妇,女主人,女能人,情妇]]跣础鷑.小姐,姑娘
miss小姐,姑娘+is→小姐或姑娘最终都会变成太太或妻子
